Interface OvenI

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface OvenI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface CarBatteryI defines the services to access car battery state and its operations
